verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During a Florida roundtable on tax cuts for small businesses] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: asked] [ARG1: if there were any Hispanics in the room] .
During a Florida roundtable on tax cuts for small businesses , President Trump asked if there [V: were] [ARG1: any Hispanics] [ARGM-LOC: in the room] .
